name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Operations Engineer with 13+ years of experience in high-performance application delivery and innovative system management. Proficient in **Linux**, **Windows**, **Python**, **Bash**, *PowerShell*, and infrastructure automation tools including **Ansible**, **Puppet**, and **Chef**. Skilled in **Incident Response**, **Performance Tuning**, **Monitoring**, and **Cloud Monitoring** strategies. Expertise in implementing **Infrastructure as Code (IaC)** practices, ensuring robust **Backup**, **Disaster Recovery**, and **Security Patching** measures.

Demonstrated ability to enhance operational efficiency through automation and compliance-driven development, specifically within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proven experience with **GCP**, as well as building AI/ML-powered platforms utilizing **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Knowledgeable in **AWS** and **Azure** cloud deployments, along with comprehensive skills in managing model training and orchestration using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
